name: Sudoku Times!
description:
Sudoku Times! features thousands of newspaper-style Sudoku number puzzles, now available digitally. Try the world's best, most user-friendly mobile sudoku game for FREE! Take a break from your busy work and stress through Sudoku puzzles; Get endless fun and relaxation from a great brain training puzzle!

Choose the level of difficulty you want in Sudoku Times! Play easy levels to rest your brain, or try professional levels to challenge problem-solving and logic skills.

Solve Sudoku puzzles and train your brain to increase your championship points! If you build up your championship points, you can compete with global users and challenge harder levels.

Get started NOW with thousands of finely crafted Sudoku puzzles!

SPECIAL FEATURES:
Five perfectly balanced difficulty levels: Easy, Normal, Hard, Expert, Master
More than 1,000 levels (all FREE!!)
Unlimited Undo
Unlimited Notes feature: Automatically update notes every time you fill a cell!
Error auto-check function

The best sudoku game for both beginners and experienced players! Open Sudoku Times! to the front page and explore a variety of play styles and techniques. Gather champion points to improve your skills and challenge more difficult Sudoku. Your journey starts today!

Notes
• Enjoy on a variety of devices (mobile phones and tablets).
•This app includes full-screen advertisements.
